changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.coordinate_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Otherwise meaningless identifier for a definition rule coordinate bigint NOT NULL, -- The specific coordinate this rule pertains to attribute bigint NOT NULL, -- The attribute of the given coordinate this rule defines product_value bigint, -- If the Attribute is Product-valued, the value is stored in this column integer_value integer, -- If the Attribute is integer-valued, the value is stored in this column numeric_value numeric, -- If the Attribute is numerically-valued (i.e. non-integer), the value is stored in this column boolean_value boolean, -- If the Attribute is boolean-valued, the value is stored in this column text_value character varying, -- If the Attribute is text-valued, the value is stored in this column timestamp_value timestamp, binary_value bytea, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, unit bigint, notes character varying, -- Usage notes for this rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The time at which this rule was last updated CONSTRAINT coordinate_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT coordinate_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_attribute_coordinate_fkey FOREIGN KEY (coordinate) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_attribute_product_value_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_value) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_attribute_unit_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_attribute_coordinate_key UNIQUE (coordinate , attribute ), CONSTRAINT valid_attribute CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(product_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(boolean_value) + ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(timestamp_value) + ruleform.null_zero(binary_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.coordinate_attribute IS 'Describes the details of a specific coordinate'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.id IS 'Otherwise meaningless identifier for a definition rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.coordinate IS 'The specific coordinate this rule pertains to'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.attribute IS 'The attribute of the given coordinate this rule defines'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.product_value IS 'If the Attribute is Product-valued, the value is stored in this column'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.integer_value IS 'If the Attribute is integer-valued, the value is stored in this column'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.numeric_value IS 'If the Attribute is numerically-valued (i.e. non-integer), the value is stored in this column'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.boolean_value IS 'If the Attribute is boolean-valued, the value is stored in this column'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.text_value IS 'If the Attribute is text-valued, the value is stored in this column'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.notes IS 'Usage notes for this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.updated_by IS 'The agency that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_attribute.update_date IS 'The time at which this rule was last updated';
